elements.text: Your job has taken you all over the country with new opportunities. Your boss approaches you at work asking if you can take a position a few hours away, but moving to a new place would mean needing a new medical team unfamiliar with your HD history. The thought of a new city, friends, and medical providers is...

elements.name: Moving to a New City_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
